pydexpi.dexpi_classes.piping.pipingNetworkSystem module

This module contains a pydantic class for the DEXPI PipingNetworkSystem class

class pydexpi.dexpi_classes.piping.pipingNetworkSystem.PipingNetworkSystem(*, id: str = None, plantTrain: PlantTrain | None = None, plantSystem: PlantSystem | None = None, plantArea: PlantArea | None = None, parentStructure: TechnicalItemParentStructure | None = None, customAttributes: list[CustomAttribute] = [], segments: list[PipingNetworkSegment] = [], fluidCode: str | None = None, heatTracingType: HeatTracingTypeClassification | None = None, heatTracingTypeRepresentation: str | None = None, insulationThickness: NullableLength | None = None, insulationType: str | None = None, jacketLineNumber: str | None = None, jacketedLineNumber: str | None = None, jacketedPipe: JacketedPipeClassification | None = None, lineNumber: str | None = None, lowerLimitHeatTracingTemperature: NullableTemperature | None = None, nominalDiameterNumericalValueRepresentation: str | None = None, nominalDiameterRepresentation: str | None = None, nominalDiameterStandard: NominalDiameterStandardClassification | None = None, nominalDiameterTypeRepresentation: str | None = None, onHold: OnHoldClassification | None = None, pipingClassCode: str | None = None, pipingNetworkSystemGroupNumber: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: CustomAttributeOwner, TechnicalItem

A fluid system of interconnected piping network branches limited by Unit Operation Inlet/Outlet and Piping Network Terminators. In this context Piping includes e.g. plumbing and tubing (from http://data.posccaesar.org/rdl/RDS270359).
